title: serious bug in runtime.SetFinalizer: code run too early
body:
Sometimes, the code that is defined by runtime.SetFinalizer is  
run while the object it is set on is still in use.

I noticed this in a complex program. I will try to write a small
example to demonstrate it.
  
This didn't happen in go 1.0.3



Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux/amd64

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go version go1.1 linux/amd64
